content: the brodie bunny lovey is the new best friend for that special little person in your life quick to make the perfect gift for birthdays or baby showers full instructions for a corner to corner c2c granny square blanket with an amigurumi bunny attached the pattern contains plenty of photos to help with assembly **size ** blanket square - 35cm x 35cm 13¾ x 13¾ approx finished lovey 45cm 17½ approx from square tip to top of brodie s head **yarn ** this pattern was designed with the new cygnet pato baby prints dk a sweet self striping baby yarn yarn a - cygnet pato baby prints dk x 100g in shade paintbox 7766 x 1 ball yarn b cygnet pato everyday dk x 100g in shade lilac 986 x 1 ball small amount of black 4ply yarn or embroidery thread held double to embroider facial features **gauge ** gauge is not too important for the blanket as a guide 5 gr-cluster = 9 cm 3½ for brodie make sure to create a fabric that is tight enough for stuffing to not show through the stitches **hooks ** 4 5mm crochet hook for blanket 3 25mm crochet hook for brodie **other materials required ** stitch markers tape measure scissors doll needle for assembling bunny and lovey darning needle for sewing in ends toy stuffing
